ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1.8 ounce) packet dry vegetable soup mix

cookingTips: Mix dip at least 1 hour ahead of serving to allow flavors to develop
Adjust consistency by adding more sour cream if too thick or salsa if too thin
Chill until serving time for best flavor and texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is the ultimate quick dip with just three ingredients. How could you customize it with fresh ingredients for your next gathering?
